name: Leave Me Alone (itch) (ScreenNuke Games)
description:
I forgot to turn the enemy script on so that's a bust but that doesn't mean that you can't enjoy it! 

Collect all the yellow glowing items to win!  Look at the monster to freeze him. Listen to the breathing he could be close...

W/S/A/D :move

E:Pickup 

LShift:Sprint
